attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We asking for better child abuse sentancing.
The time in prison is at most 14years for neglect and abuse
we would like to see that this is raised to 20 years maximum
And for the Abusers to be sentanced to the maximum sentance in such horrific crime as the baby p case and no person
who is involved in child abuse of such horrific nature to be allowed free or have suspended sentance
as was in the news of late.
We want the goverement to help stamp out abuse.
and for the abusers to get sentanced with in the accordance of the crime
They have killed a small child who could not protect them selfs
and have put the child through weeks/ months of torture and the fear and pain this child has suffered has to be reconised in sentancing
At the momement the publicare distcusted with all the leinant sentances they are seeing on child abuse
And are outrage at the lack of time and in some cases no time at all spent in prison

rejection.details:
This overlaps with:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/protectchildren1/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Abuse-law/

Also, titles should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not your name or a statement. This helps readers to find your petition and understand what it is about.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
